arguments.description:
The arguments to pass to the executable
Default is []

startAtLaunch.description:
Wether or not to start the process(es) at launch
Default is true

instances.description:
The number of instances of the process to run
Default is 1

restart.description:
'always': always restart the process if it exits
'never': never restart the process
'on-failure': restart if the process exits with an error code
'unless-stopped': restart the process except if the user stops it manually through the console
Default is 'on-failure'

expectedExitStatus.description:
The expected success exit status code for the process(es)
Default is 0

startTime.description:
The time to wait (in milliseconds) before considering that a process is sucessfuly started
Default is 0

stopTime.description:
The time to wait (in milliseconds) after a graceful stop before killing a process
Default is 5000

stopSignal.description:
The signal used to quit a process gracefully
Default is 'SIGSTOP'

stdout.description:
'ignore': ignore stdout
'redirect': redirect stdout to a log file
Default is 'redirect'

stderr.description:
'ignore': ignore stderr
'redirect': redirect stderr to a log file
Default is 'redirect'

environment.description:
Variables to pass as environment to the process(es)
Default is {}

permissions.description:
The permissions umask to set before launching the program, or null to leave the permissions as they are
Default is null

restartAttempts.description:
The number of restart attempts (or 0 for infinite attemps) if 'restart' is not set to 'never'
Default is 5

logDir.description:
The path in which to save output log files
Default is /var/log/taskmaster
